action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this grid and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your grid first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the grids to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short grid description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else. This is your grid:
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X
X ▢ ▢ X ▢
X X X ▢ ▢
X ▢ ▢ X ▢
X ▢ ▢ ▢ X

DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 square with Xs forming an hourglass shape. The top and bottom rows have Xs in the first and last columns. The middle row is filled with Xs in the first three columns. The second and fourth rows have an X in the first and fourth columns.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The grid is a 5x5 square with Xs forming an hourglass shape. The top and bottom rows have Xs in the first and last columns. The middle row is filled with Xs in the first three columns. The second and fourth rows have an X in the first and fourth columns.
Now ask a question in order to find out new aspects of my grid that may be different to your grid. Start with "QUESTION:" and do not add anything else.
QUESTION: In your grid, are there any Xs in the second and fourth columns of the middle row?
